resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73140</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73140</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40c87b29-1104-4211-299f-6cada1b6271d#1#5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Gondolatok a művészetről</string>
            <string language="en">thoughts about art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gedanken über kunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pensées au sujet d'art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pensamentos sobre a arte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pensieri circa arte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σκέψεις για την τέχνη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pensamientos sobre arte</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A művészetről alkotott közhelyek toposzainak eredete, forrásszemelvények</string>
            <string language="en">the origin of toposies and commonplaces formed of art, source selection</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">művészetelmélet,  szépség,  arányok,  mimézis,  természet utánzás stb.,  </string>
            <string language="en">theory of art, beuty, ratio, mimesis, copy nature, etc,</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">der Ursprung von toposies und von Gemeinplätzen 
bildete sich von der kunst, Quellauswahl</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'origine des toposies et des banalités a formé
de l'art, sélection de source</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a origem dos toposies e dos commonplaces deu 
forma da arte, seleção da fonte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">l'origine dei toposies e dei commonplaces ha 
formato dell'arte, selezione di sorgente</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η προέλευση των toposies και των κοινοτοπιών που 
διαμορφώνονται της τέχνης, επιλογή πηγής</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el origen de toposies y de trivialidades formó del
arte, selección de la fuente</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Theorie der kunst, beuty, des Verhältnisses, des 
mimesis, der Exemplarnatur, des usw.,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">théorie d'art, beuty, de taux, de mimesis, de nature 
de copie, etc..,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">teoria da arte, beuty, da relação, do mimesis, da 
natureza da cópia, etc.,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">teoria di arte, beuty, del rapporto, del mimesis, della
natura della copia, ecc,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θεωρία της τέχνης, beuty, της αναλογίας, του mimesis, 
της φύσης αντιγράφων, κ.λπ...,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">teoría del arte, beuty, de la relación de 
transformación, del mimesis, de la naturaleza de la copia, del etc,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">11-13</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Kossuth Kiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>73140</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=40c87b29-1104-4211-299f-6cada1b6271d&v=1&b=5</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
